casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
William RODRIGUEZ, Appellant. 2017-1139 Court of Appeals of New York. December 12, 2017

Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Michael J. Hutter, Esq., c/o Powers & Santola, LLP, 39 North Pearl Street, Albany NY 12207-2844 assigned as counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
